task.title: Compile multiple documents
task.shortdesc: Compile multiple documents with one command using glob patterns

taskbody.prereq: The CLI makes use of the node glob library. For possible glob patterns and other information, please refer to their documentation. Basic knowledge of glob patterns is required to fully understand this task.

context.p: When you have multiple configurations, e.g., for multiple maps and/or multiple deliverables per map, it is possible to compile all of them using just one command.
context.note: To avoid confusion, we suggest to specify individual output directories in your configuration files for each configuration. This way, each configuration will have exactly one corresponding output directory.

step.cmd: Run the dita-ot-helper command using a glob pattern to match your configuration files
step.tutorialinfo: The same patterns as with apply here. The only difference is using a glob pattern instead of the file name of a config file.
step.stepxmp: In our example from above, we need to run$ dita-ot-helper end-user-manual-*.json
step.stepresult: dita-ot-helper will process (i.e., compile) all the JSON files matching the patterns.
